scenario_text.value:
Oh, it’s you guys. Sorry, we haven’t found
the shrine yet.

Hey Takuma, don’t you think it’s weird that
we’ve come up empty after looking so much?

Well, it’s too early to give up. We have to
keep going...

All right, Saki, I’ll teach you the secret to
finding what you’re looking for!
The secret? What? What is it?!
This better not be another joke...

(I can understand why Aoi would be fed up,
but Saki wants to hear him out.)
(What should I do?)
Let Minoru speak.
Stop Minoru.

(I’m curious about what he plans to say. I’ll
just listen in...)

You ready? When looking for something, they
say you’ll find it when you least expect it.

So you just gotta lower your expectations!
Same as how most people find dates.
What’s that got to do with anything?!
Thank you, I’ll be here all week!
Ahaha! What, so this is a stand-up routine now?

(Saki’s cheered up a bit... Was that his goal
all along? Sheesh, what a guy.)

Enough with the wisecracks, Minoru. We should
be helping them look, not getting in the way.

Huh? But you can’t call it a wisecrack
without the punchline, man.

Minoru! This is no time to be joking around,
you know!
Oui, madam, so sorry, madam.
You⁠—!
...Heh, well that’s how it goes, I guess.

All right, let’s leave Minoru to his jokes
and get back to the task at hand, Aoi.

Yeah, we’ll see how funny he is after he gets
a smaller portion at supper.
Aw come on, lighten up, Aoi!

(Minoru put a smile on their faces. He really
is on another level sometimes.)

Ah, that’s right. I saw someone that looked
like Haru a while ago...
What, here too?!

Shh, keep your voice down! What if Aoi hears
you?!
Wait, why are you hiding it from her?

I’m the only one who saw him. I didn’t know
if it was the real Haru or a fake...

If Aoi knew, she’d run off to help him
regardless, wouldn’t she? That worried me...

Saki, shouldn’t you whisper if you’re trying
to keep a secret?
Aoi! Um, sorry, I just...

It’s okay, I know you’re just thinking of me.
I’m happy, really.
Oh yeah? Well then... Hehe.

We also saw Haru. We’re actually going after
him.

I see... Still, it might be a Kenzoku in
disguise.

We considered that possibility too, but...
it’s probably the real Haru.

Hmm... Even so, be careful if you’re going
after him.
Aoi and I have got things covered here.
You guys go check somewhere else.
